helm-values.api-usage-server.description: api-usage-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/api-usage/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.cluster-manager-server.description: cluster-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/cluster-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.cluster-monitor-agent.description: cluster-monitor-agent is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/cluster-monitor/tree/main/deployments/agent.

helm-values.cluster-monitor-server.description: cluster-monitor-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/cluster-monitor/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.dex-server.description: dex-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/dex/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.file-manager-server.description: file-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/file-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.global.auth.dexServerAddr.description: The address of the dex-server to verify a token.

helm-values.global.auth.rbacInternalServ.description: The address for the rbac-server to use API auth.

helm-values.global.awsSecret.accessKeyId.description: The key name with an access key ID set.

helm-values.global.awsSecret.secretAcces.description: The key name with a secret access key set.

helm-values.global.database.createDataba.description: Specify whether to create the database if it does not exist.

helm-values.global.database.originalData.description: Specify the original database name to connect to before creating the database. If empty, use "template1".

helm-values.global.database.ssl.mode.description: This option determines whether or with what priority a secure. SSL TCP/IP connection will be negotiated with the database. For more information, see [Database Connection Control](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/libpq-connect.html#LIBPQ-CONNECT-SSLMODE)

helm-values.global.database.ssl.rootCert.description:
Specify the name of a file containing SSL certificate authority
(CA) certificate. If the file exists, the server's certificate
will be verified to be signed by one of these authorities. For more information, see [Database Connection Control](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/libpq-connect.html#LIBPQ-CONNECT-SSLROOTCERT)

helm-values.global.databaseSecret.key.description: The key name with a password set.

helm-values.global.ingress.annotations.description: Optional additional annotations to add to the Ingress.

helm-values.global.ingress.controllerUrl.description: The URL of the ingress controller that can be accessed from outside the Kubernetes cluster. The dex-server uses this for the issuer and redirect URL.

helm-values.global.ingress.tls.description:
If specified, the API accessed via Ingress will be enabled for TLS. For more information, see [Enable TLS](https://llmariner.ai/docs/setup/install/single_cluster_production/#optional-enable-tls).

For example:
tls:
  hosts:
  - api.llm.mydomain.com
  secretName: api-tls

helm-values.global.objectStore.s3.assume.description:
Optional AssumeRole.
For more information, see [AssumeRole](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/STS/latest/APIReference/API_AssumeRole.html).

helm-values.global.objectStore.s3.bucket.description: The bucket name to store data.

helm-values.global.objectStore.s3.endpoi.description: Optional endpoint URL for the object store.

helm-values.global.usageSender.description: Settings for sending usage data to the usage API server.

helm-values.global.worker.controlPlaneAd.description: If specified, use this address for accessing the control-plane. This is necessary when installing LLMariner in a multi-cluster mode. For more information, see [Install across Multiple Clusters](https://llmariner.ai/docs/setup/install/multi_cluster_production/).

helm-values.global.worker.registrationKe.description: The key name with a registration key set.

The secret name. `default-cluster-registration-key` is available when the control-plane and worker-plane are in the same cluster. This Secret is generated by cluster-manager-server as default. For more information, see [Install across Multiple Clusters](https://llmariner.ai/docs/setup/install/multi_cluster_production/).

helm-values.global.worker.tls.enable.description: The flag to enable TLS access to the control-plane.

helm-values.global.workerServiceGrpcServ.description: Optional additional annotations to add to Service of the job-manager-server worker service.

helm-values.global.workerServiceIngress..description: Optional additional annotations to add to the worker Ingress.
Specify whether to create an Ingress.

helm-values.inference-manager-engine.description: inference-manager-engine is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/inference-manager/tree/main/deployments/engine.

helm-values.inference-manager-server.description: inference-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/inference-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.job-manager-dispatcher.description: job-manager-dispatcher is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/job-manager/tree/main/deployments/dispatcher.

helm-values.job-manager-server.description: job-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/job-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.job-manager-syncer.description: job-manager-syncer is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/job-manager/tree/main/deployments/syncer.

helm-values.model-manager-loader.description: model-manager-loader is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/model-manager/tree/main/deployments/loader.

helm-values.model-manager-server.description: model-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/model-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.prepare.database.createSecre.description: If enabled, a Secret resource for the database access is created. This secret is refereed in `.global.databaseSecret`.

helm-values.prepare.huggingFaceApiKey.cr.description: If enabled, a Secret resource for the Hugging Face API Key is created. This secret is refereed in `.model-manager-loader.huggingFaceSecret`.

helm-values.prepare.objectStore.createSe.description:
If enabled, a Secret resource for the object store access is created.
This secret is refereed in `.global.awsSecret`.

helm-values.prepare.redis.createSecret.description: If enabled, a Secret resource for the redis access is created. This secret is refereed in `.inference-manager-server.rateLimit.redis.secretName`.

helm-values.prepare.redis.password.description: The redis password for the redis.

helm-values.prepare.tenantClusterRegistr.description: If enabled, a Secret resource for the tenant control-plane cluster is created. This secret is refereed in `.job-manager-syncer.apiKeySecret`.
The service account key for the tenant control-plane cluser.

helm-values.prepare.workerRegistration.c.description: If enabled, a Secret resource for the control-plane access is created. This secret is refereed in `.global.worker.registrationKeySecret`.

helm-values.prepare.workerRegistration.k.description: The registration key for the worker.

helm-values.rbac-server.description: rbac-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/rbac/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.session-manager-agent.description: session-manager-agent is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/session-manager/tree/main/deployments/agent.

helm-values.session-manager-server.description: session-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/session-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.tags.control-plane.description: The flag that defines whether to install the control-plane components.

helm-values.tags.tenant-control-plane.description: The flag that defines whther to install the tenant control-plane components.

helm-values.tags.worker.description: The flag that defines whether to install the worker-plane components.

helm-values.user-manager-server.description: user-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/user-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.

helm-values.vector-store-manager-server.description: vector-store-manager-server is the sub-chart configurable values. For other values, see https://github.com/llmariner/vector-store-manager/tree/main/deployments/server.
